name: pnp-detecting-pii-exists-in-sharepointlist-column
title: Detecting PII exists in SharePoint List using AWS Comprehend
shortDescription: The script uses Amazon Comprehend to detect PII entities from a specific SharePoint List column record the results in another list and CSV report.
longDescription: In this post, I showcased using Amazon Comprehend to detect PII entities from a specific SharePoint List column and record the results in another list and CSV report via the AWS CLI and CLI for Microsoft 365.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
